In particular, lead (with the existing team) the design and development of the PCIe host controller driver and its related activities with the Trusted Firmware, UEFI and OS accordingly. Communicate with customers regarding all aspect of customer firmware concerns. In addition, handle cross function interaction with other teams. Working in this area brings out the best engineering in people and produces products that have value in the market. The ARM server firmware/software is relatively new and you will have the opportunity to invent new software technology and influence the ARM server community.
